function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inhomogeneous mixing of outdoor and indoor air leading to unpredictable distribution of virus particles","Impact":"Increased risk of viral contamination and infection due to unpredictable and uneven distribution of airborne virus particles","Mitigation":"Use advanced ventilation system with filtration and air purification to ensure even distribution of outdoor air and elimination of virus particles","Technologies":"Advanced HVAC systems with high-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters and ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI)","People":"Occupants of the building, especially those in poorly ventilated areas","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"},{"Description":"Complex indoor air flows due to temperature differences and heat production exacerbating viral distribution unpredictability","Impact":"Difficulty in controlling the distribution of airborne virus particles, leading to increased risk of infection","Mitigation":"Implement temperature control systems and consider heat production when designing ventilation strategy to minimize airflow complexity","Technologies":"Smart HVAC systems with temperature and airflow control features","People":"Occupants of the building","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"},{"Description":"Unknown presence and location of infectious occupants within indoor spaces","Impact":"Difficulty in assessing and mitigating the risk of infection given the lack of knowledge about the presence and location of potential sources of virus transmission","Mitigation":"Implement continuous air monitoring and filtration systems to detect and eliminate virus particles regardless of the source location","Technologies":"Air quality sensors, continuous monitoring systems, and filtration devices","People":"All occupants of the building","Owner":"Building owners, facility management"}]}
